name: Bitcoin Widgets
author: Banana

sections.description:
Simple widget for displaying current bitcoin quotes to currencies.

Current options of widget:

  • Fiat Currencies Support: USD, RUR, EUR, UAH.
  • May displaying several widgets with same page

Used services

Service link: https://api.itez.com/api/frame/v1/public/exchange
Service description: This service help you to recieve some information about crypto currency
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets screen to choose and configure the widget
sections.faq:
Will you add more currency pairs?

Yes. It will be in next release.

Will there be a widget with multiple currency pairs?

Yes. It will be in next release.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release
  • 1 widget with 4 fiat currencies

1.1

  • Added possibility to choose different styles of showing
  • Added possibility to choose one or 4 currencies to show
